items.sentence: Tom told me that he couldn\'t remember the teacher\'s name.
Tom hasn\'t yet been told that he doesn\'t have to do that.
Tom wondered how long it would take Mary to finish the job.
Tom held the knife between his teeth as he untied the knot.
I have an important meeting I have to go to this afternoon.
I was very surprised when Tom told me Mary had left Boston.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will drink any beer.
Don\'t do anything until we know exactly what\'s happening.
One thing that I didn\'t like about Boston was the weather.
Have you ever stopped to think about how good your life is?
